name: EASession
desc: The object you use to manage communications between your app and a connected hardware accessory.

items.name: init?(accessory: EAAccessory, forProtocol: String)
items.desc: Initializes the session for the specified accessory and protocol.

items.name: var accessory: EAAccessory?
items.desc: The accessory attached to the session.

items.name: var protocolString: String?
items.desc: The protocol being used for communication with the accessory.

items.name: var inputStream: InputStream?
items.desc: The stream to use for receiving data from the accessory.

items.name: var outputStream: OutputStream?
items.desc: The stream to use for sending data to the accessory.
